original: Åkerlind, Nils Johan, telegrafkommissarie, Karlshamn, f. 25/6/98 i Sthlm. G. 36 m. Marta Jacobsson. Telegr:-komm. i Skara 46, i Karlshamn fr. 47.
translated: Åkerlind, Nils Johan, telegraph officer, Karlshamn, b. June 25, 1898 in Stockholm. Married in 1936 to Marta Jacobsson. Telegraph officer in Skara from 1946, in Karlshamn from 1947.
